Description: Play this card if you would add a Disaster card to you Disaster Area this round. Add that Disaster card to another player's Disaster Area instead.
Play this card during scoring. Add 2 points to any player's score this round.
Play this card during scoring. Switch the score of the highest-scoring player with the score of the lowest-scoring player after scores have been calculated.
Play this card during scoring. Subtract 2 points from any player's score this round.
Play this card if you would add a Disaster card to your Disaster Area this round. Move that Disaster card to the bottom of the Disaster deck instead.
